description: This file contains centralized configuration helpers for environment variables, feature flags, experiments, URLs, and logging levels in a React project. It defines functions for safely accessing environment variables, parsing feature flags, and constructing URLs, all intended for use across the frontend application.

methods.name: getEnv(key)
methods.description: Safely retrieves a string environment variable value, returning undefined if unset or empty.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the API base URL from environment variables REACT_APP_API_BASE or REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL.

methods.name: getWsBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the WebSocket base URL from environment variable REACT_APP_WS_URL.

methods.name: getFrontendUrl()
methods.description: Returns the frontend URL from environment variable REACT_APP_FRONTEND_URL.

methods.name: getLogLevel()
methods.description: Returns the logging level, defaulting to 'info' if not set.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags()
methods.description: Parses the REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS environment variable into an object of feature flags with boolean values.

methods.name: experimentsEnabled()
methods.description: Returns a boolean indicating if experiments are enabled based on environment variable REACT_APP_EXPERIMENTS_ENABLED.

methods.name: makeUrl(base, path)
methods.description: Concatenates a base URL and a path into a single URL string, ensuring proper slash placement.
